data.message: Hi Mr Mathers, I am contacting you on my daughters behalf, whom passed away from an accidentally drug overdose.  I am her mother, Kimberly Kimmel, Erika, my 21 year old passed from peer pressure of a drug called oxymorphone. She did not do this sort of thing and preferred organic ways of taking the edge off, which as her mother I would have preferred that, to be completely honest.mshe suffered from Anxiety, ADD which can result in Depression. She had such a huge heart and so full of life it was a tradegy to most around especially to her sister, myself and her father.

replies.message: So sorry to hear this.stAY STRONG

Imtiaz Dangraj  Thank you but it needs to be out there and known that young adults do not realize the exact effect and end result. She was my numero uno and I'm trying to learn to live without her and the only thing I can do is rise above and help others. And truly get it out there. With Angelique's Wings.

Again, thank you
